author: bnicholes
msg: Fixed the AWK script so that it will pick up functions that have been
declared on multiple lines such as create_connection in connection.h.
Otherwise multi-line declared functions are omitted from the export list.

author: dougm
msg: add input filter AP_MODE_INIT support to handshake before reading
request data from the client.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:	dougm
Reviewed by:	wrowe

author: dougm
msg: add new input filter mode AP_MODE_INIT:
allows filters such as mod_ssl to initialize a client connection
(ie handshake) before reading request data from the client.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:   dougm
Reviewed by:	wrowe
